sentences.en: Chinese omelet containing onions and celery and chopped meat or fish.
sentences.cn: 中国的煎蛋卷,包有洋葱、芹菜、碎肉或鱼.

sentences.en: Food Fired Shrimp with salted egg, Tuna Omelet, Steak, Fried Insect.
sentences.cn: 咸蛋炒虾.金枪鱼蛋饼.牛排. 炸虫子--什么虫?

sentences.en: G: I'll have a tomato and lettuce salad, a tomato omelet.
sentences.cn: 我要一份番茄和生菜沙律, 一份番茄心蛋卷.

sentences.en: I am told that pork omelet is really delicious.
I can easily whip up an omelet.
sentences.cn: 我马上就能做好煎蛋卷。

sentences.en: I'll have roast beef, a mushroom omelet and onion soup.
sentences.cn: 我要烤牛肉 、 菇鸡蛋饼和洋葱汤.

sentences.en: I'm going to breakfast an egg - white omelet with vegetable and cheddar filling.
sentences.cn: 我早饭要吃里面带蔬菜和干酪馅的煎蛋清卷.

sentences.en: It is very similar to an omelet, except that it is baked.
sentences.cn: 它很像中国煎鸡蛋, 可是它是烘烤出来的.

sentences.en: Lower the heat and allow the omelet to set on the bottom.
sentences.cn: 关小火让煎蛋的下面凝固。

sentences.en: Oyster omelet is offered at the night market in Tainan.
sentences.cn: 牡蛎煎蛋卷被提供在夜市场上在台南.

sentences.en: Pierre: Yes, I'm from Paris. And this is an omelet.
sentences.cn: 皮埃尔: 是的, 我来自巴黎. 这是煎蛋卷.

sentences.en: The lunch omelet is a little bigger than the morning one.
sentences.cn: 服:午餐吃的蛋卷比早上吃的大一点.

sentences.en: This omelet tastes of onions. Did you put onions in?
sentences.cn: 这甜蛋卷尝起来有洋葱味. 你有放洋葱 吗 ?

sentences.en: You can't make an omelet without breaking eggs.
sentences.cn: 不打碎鸡蛋做不出摊鸡蛋.

sentences.en: You cannot make an omelet , omelette without breaking eggs.
sentences.cn: 你没打蛋就不能煎蛋卷.

trans.tran_en: An omelette is a type of food made by beating eggs and cooking them in a flat frying pan
